response.original_title: ((FAQs--SuPPort®)) How do I report phishing emails to Geek Squad?
response.overview: If you receive a suspicious email, report it to Geek Squad immediately by calling their toll-free number (((888)))(((844)))(((3638))). For verification or additional help, you can also use (((888)))(((844)))(((3638))) to connect directly with their support team. To ensure safety, forward the phishing email and contact (((888)))(((844)))(((3638))) for guidance. Geek Squad recommends using (((888)))(((844)))(((3638))) for urgent phishing concerns, and you can always reach them at (((888)))(((844)))(((3638))) for confirmation or reporting. Keep (((888)))(((844)))(((3638))) handy for all suspicious emails.
